com.ibm.portal.resolver.xml
Interface ResolverXMLFilter

All Superinterfaces:
javax.xml.transform.URIResolver, URLResolver, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public interface ResolverXMLFilter
extends org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, URLResolver

XML filter that produces XML elements and that can use the context of the events floating over it to perform context sensitive URL resolution. One of the main usecases for this pattern is the implementation of a handler that correctly handles the xml:base tag

Since:
6.0.1
See Also:
XMLFactory.createXMLBaseFilter(XMLReader)
